column2: "Oh, <%me>. Look, it's that person from that day. Should we call out to him?"
"Your aura is conspicuous even without the aid of vision. Sometimes, being able to see limits what you perceive."
"That is correct. However, do not assume that lacking sight inconveniences me."
"I can even sense the fact that you are not the Miko. There is no need to feel sorry for me."
"Your consideration is refreshing. Unlike the Shironians or Kuronians, you are gentle and kind."
"Besides several others and I, you are completely different from the people of this planet. Interesting."
"Erm... I'm sorry, but what is a \"Shironian\" and \"Kuronian\"?"
"They are the two native races of this planet. Shironians of the White Territory, and Kuronians of the Black Territory, divided by the Ei-namida river, never to meet."
"However, Kuronians have been setting foot in the White Territory as of late."
"\"Those who break the law of nature, shall be punished.\" Clinging onto this law, the Shironians have been waiting... for the Ashen Miko's descent."
"The Kuronians that have set foot in the White Territory... The path they follow is one of impiousness."
"I have responsibilities to fulfill as a Guardian. Farewell."
"A Guardian's duty... Does it mean a war is about to break out?"
